original_title: พรายตะเคียน
overview: The oldest Thai ghost film still surviving today. and is an example of the nature of short films used to feature long films in the past. created by company Sri Burapha Movie The filmmaker of the pioneer era, Sodsri Phakdichit, or real name Sodsri Phakdiwichit, tells the story of the ghost of Nang Prai Takhian who has deceived the villagers. The scene where the characters run away from the ghosts scattered in the story is an important model of later Thai ghost films.
title: The Ghoul
